solution_line_template: The total percentage of those who rated Excellent or Very Satisfactory is {excellent_percentage}% + {very_satisfactory_percentage}% = {total_excellent_very_satisfactory_percentage}%.

Seventy-five percent of the parents is {total_parents} x {total_excellent_very_satisfactory_percentage}/{percentage_denominator} = <<{total_parents}*{total_excellent_very_satisfactory_percentage}/{percentage_denominator}={num_excellent_very_satisfactory}>>{num_excellent_very_satisfactory}.

Hence, {total_parents} - {num_excellent_very_satisfactory} = <<{total_parents}-{num_excellent_very_satisfactory}={remaining_parents}>>{remaining_parents} students rated either Satisfactory or Needs Improvement.

A total of {remaining_parents} x {satisfactory_percentage}/{percentage_denominator} = <<{remaining_parents}*{satisfactory_percentage}/{percentage_denominator}={num_satisfactory}>>{num_satisfactory} parents rated Satisfactory.
